"About this Quest":
"In this quest, you cannot receive the items dropped by enemies until you clear the quest.

When you clear the quest, the items will be available at the end area."

"If you are wearing specific costumes or layered wear, you can receive the effect of the \"Costume Bonus\" PSE.
\"Costume Bonus\" increases your rare drop rate and the amount of EXP you earn.
For details on which costumes this PSE applies to, please check bumped.org.

※The PSE effect is limited to this quest, and if you switch to a non-applicable costume while the PSE is active, it will cease to apply to you."

"Many ARKS Weapons will be made available for you to use during this quest.

Some ARKS Weapons in this quest have had their power greatly increased.

The following two types of weapons have had their power increased:
・Gun emplacement
・Photon Particle Cannon"
